Multiple reverse image searches were con: 2. The first image was published by a website called Portside on January 13, credited to photographer Ajit Solanki from Associated Press (AP). The image showed members of various trade unions shouting slogans during a general strike in Ahmadabad, India, on January 8, 2020.
The second image was published by News C: 7 in 2018 and credited to Sitaram Yechury, general secretary of the Communist Party of India (Marxist). Yechury claimed that the image was taken during Mumbai's Kisaan March in 2018.
The third and fourth images were availab: crediting photographer Narinder Nan. These images showed activists of the Communist Party of India Marxist (CPIM) and members of different workers unions shouting slogans as they blocked train tracks during a nationwide general strike in Amritsar on January 8, 2020.
